actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to provide that Federal employees may be allowed to take accrued annual leave or leave without pay for a period following the adoption of a minor child.

summary.text: Requires that a request by a Federal employee to take accrued annual leave or leave without pay for adjustment purposes immediately following the adoption by such employee of a minor child be considered as justified as would be a request for leave for such purpose immediately following the birth of a child of such employee.

titles.title: A bill to provide that Federal employees may be allowed to take accrued annual leave or leave without pay for a period following the adoption of a minor child.
